entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
